channel.title: Run.nat issue!
channel.description:
So players who don't have a 64 bit cannot run my client. They cannot login to my server. How do I change it to a 32 run added aswell for players who have a 32 bit can run my client? Here is the code I have.
64 bit run! @echo off title Your World Scape Client v1.00 :main cd Files "C:/Program Files (x86)/java/jre7/bin/java.exe" -Xmx500m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui pause
32 bit run I am currently working on! Does not work!
@echo off title Your World Scape Client v1.00 :main cd Files "C:\Program Files\Java\jre7\bin\java.exe" -Xmx500m Gui 30 0 highmem members 32 pause
Can someone switch my code so that people with a 32 bit can run on my client?

item.title: Run.nat issue!
item.dc:creator: @chrisrocks4122 chrisrocks4122
item.description:
@chrisrocks4122 wrote:

It’s start javaw -Xmx524m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui?

Read full topic

item.title: Run.nat issue!
item.dc:creator: @Dan0194 Dan0194
item.description:
@Dan0194 wrote:

@echo off title Compiler :main cd Files start javaw -Xmx524m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui pause
That Should work for 32 bit.

Read full topic

So players who don’t have a 64 bit cannot run my client. They cannot login to my server. How do I change it to a 32 run added aswell for
players who have a 32 bit can run my client? Here is the code I have.

:main

pause

pause
